channel.title: HECK BUTTERFLY
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "HECK BUTTERFLY" - NEVER GET IT

item.title: Re: HECK BUTTERFLY
item.content:encoded: No, they can't. Please turn caps lock off.

item.title: Re: HECK BUTTERFLY
item.content:encoded:
CAN SOMEONE COME TO DEMOLITION VILLAGE AND PLZ GIVE ME 3 REAPER ITEMS BECAUSE OUR HOKAGE IS KINDA SLACK
GREATLY APPRECIATED !!!!
THNX
Matthew(username)

item.title: Re: HECK BUTTERFLY
item.content:encoded: Try asking your village leader for permission to get 3 reaper items out of the storehouse it's easier that way.Also EDUT is now taght by spot,not red rover and you need to use dog biscuits/snacks whatever they're called.

item.title: Re: HECK BUTTERFLY
item.content:encoded: 5) see if somebody put one in the storehouse of your village, it's not like they're any use to anybody who already has one

item.title: Re: HECK BUTTERFLY
item.content:encoded:
firstly -> do you do the mission specific or general?? it pop up as c-mission in the d-mission selection. you have to run general mission d-ranks

2) if you are a white-eye ninja use white eye. it increase the chance to find it.
3) if u are the owner of a ninja dog, learn and use the epic dog urination technique which is teached by red rover
4) use spot and/or make the team red rover/spot
